title: So Big
lyrics:
Then theres a boy i.y.a.z...???
Refrain:
Now i wanna do it up So Big
Party it up So Big

Spend it up So Big

So the whole world knows my love for you is (So Big)

My heart is So Big

My love is So Big

For you, for you



Verse:



Now was a girl like u, nothing u cant do

But keep the whole world to a 24-7

When she looking so sweet that kind of body

You going mine spending all of your time..time..time

And its not that you asking me for nothing

I just wanna show you how deep my love is



Bridge:



I saw them girls before

I wasnt feeling so calm

But with u girl

I'm losing control..yo!
